name: Storm Wars CCG
summary:
Storm Wars is a collectible card strategy game which focuses on lightning-fast battles with deep deck-building strategy. Battles are fully automated, and resolve as quickly as you wish to view them – for fans of Magic the Gathering or Hearthstone, it's a whole new kind of 'rush'!

•Lightning-Fast Battles•
Epic battles in under a minute! Build your custom army, choose an opponent, and watch the chaos as the battle unfolds.

•Deep Deck-building Strategy•
With over 150 unique cards to choose from (each with their own stats and special abilities), 12 powerful heroes, and no deck building limits, the strategic possibilities are endless!

•Immersive Campaign•
Explore a detailed fantasy universe complete with 6 distinct races and an extended single-player campaign.

•Intense PVP•
Face off in ranked matches against opponents around the world in the Arena, participate in daily tournaments in the Gauntlet, or engage in direct challenges with others.
